dct_description_sm: This dataset contains the name and boundaries of Neighborhoods in the City of Trenton, New Jersey. There are three known gaps in this dataset: Two omissions are near the Battle Monument neighborhood, the third omission is the Pennington Prospect neighborhood. These problems will be fixed when time allows.
dct_creator_sm: City of Trenton Division of Planning
